com.risk.model

Class Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.model.Land
      • com.risk.model.Country
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILand

    public class Country
extends Land
    This class represents a country it maintains name, id,army, and coordinates of the country it has different methods to change the state and returns the state of the object
    Version:
    1.0.0.0
    Author:
    Kourosh Aziz-Nejad
